page.title: 16Lostock Lawn Tennis Club
page.content: Lostock Lawn Tennis Club is on{Regent {Road}in Lostock. I am a member of the club and try to play as regularly as I can. There are{five courts.}Next to the courts is the{club house}which has a {bar and a recreation room.}There are also{changing rooms. On Friday there is a{Junior night, it starts at 6 o'clock. You can play snooker and other games in the recreation room as well as tennis outside.{Seniors night}is on Wednesday. In the summer there is a set of {tennis lessons for juniors.}You are taught all the different strokes. First you are taught{forehand and {backhand.}Next comes the{serve and {volley.}When you have learnt all that you need to practice. Then you can play the game of tennis properly.
